filters_applied: Low severity: keep only if mapped to vulnerability type

findings.description:
Reentrancy in TokenVault.withdrawBalance() (samples/ds/tier1/contracts/ds_t1_002.sol#15-20):
	External calls:
	- ! (msg.sender.call.value(userBalance[msg.sender])()) (samples/ds/tier1/contracts/ds_t1_002.sol#16)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- userBalance[msg.sender] = 0 (samples/ds/tier1/contracts/ds_t1_002.sol#19)
	TokenVault.userBalance (samples/ds/tier1/contracts/ds_t1_002.sol#5) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- TokenVault.addToBalance() (samples/ds/tier1/contracts/ds_t1_002.sol#11-13)
	- TokenVault.getBalance(address) (samples/ds/tier1/contracts/ds_t1_002.sol#7-9)
	- TokenVault.withdrawBalance() (samples/ds/tier1/contracts/ds_t1_002.sol#15-20)
